Title: The Great Gatsby
Summary: A story of Jay Gatsby, a mysterious millionaire, and his love for Daisy Buchanan.

Title: Moby Dick

Title: Pride and Prejudice
Summary: The story of Elizabeth Bennet and her romantic clashes with Mr. Darcy.

Summary: Odysseus struggles to return home to Ithaca after the Trojan War, facing numerous obstacles.

Title: Great Expectations
Summary: The story of Pip, an orphan, and his growth from a poor child to a gentleman with mysterious benefactors.

Title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
Summary: A young man remains eternally youthful while a portrait of him ages and reflects his sins.

Summary: A family of tenant farmers travels to California during the Great Depression in search of a better life.

Summary: Victor Frankenstein creates a living being from dead body parts, with tragic consequences.

Summary: A family stays at a haunted hotel, and the father descends into madness.
